component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增资源库功能，智慧助手升级为 YOYO 助理，优化智慧视觉的交互操作方式，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增资源库功能，根据应用功能自动分类、智能推荐已安装应用，通过易于浏览的视图，更轻松地打开所需应用，在桌面内任意位置上滑即可体验。
• 智慧助手升级为 YOYO 助理，新增支持发送图片、文档等交流互动方式和 DeepSeek 深度思考模式。
• 优化智慧视觉的交互操作方式。
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update introduces Library. Assistant has been upgraded to YOYO Assistant. This release also optimizes the interaction methods of Honor Lens. Update to enjoy the new features and improvements.

• Library automatically categorizes apps by their functions, and intelligently suggests installed apps. Additionally, it facilitates opening required apps through a user-friendly interface. You can experience it by swiping up anywhere on the Home screen.
• Assistant has been upgraded to YOYO Assistant, now supporting new ways to interact, such as sending images and documents, as well as the DeepSeek deep thinking mode.
• Optimizes the interaction methods of Honor Lens.

1. This update will not affect your personal data, but it is recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. For more information on the features, please check out the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any issues during use, you can get our support by going to My Honor or visiting our website at https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
